page.title: 05Badlesmere-Health/Recreation
page.content: Nearest emergency hospital treatment is at Canterbury; Faversham Cottage Hospital is for minor treatment. General practitioner, dental, osteopathic, homeopathic services are available in Faversham. Chaucer Hospital in Canterbury caters for private treatment. Current trend for healthy living is catered for locally by Keep Fit Classes at Badlesmere Hall.Badlesmere has a riding stables. Family entertainment is via television and now an increasing use of video films and computer games. Most popular forms of organised entertainment are informal barbecues and barn dances. In line with current trend the local public house (Red Lion) has changed from a men only beer drinking image to cater for the whole family.
